info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 5:59PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, Cleveland, western Gaston, northwestern York, northeastern Spartanburg and Cherokee Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 559 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Gaffney, or near Boiling Springs NC, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Gaffney, Forest City, Kings Mountain, Cherryville, Boiling Springs NC, Blacksburg, Mayo, Chesnee and Grover. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
